properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, INTEREST, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
insert into member (USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, INTEREST) values(SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
